---

You are free to do whatever you like with this file, and upload it wherever you want, etc! Just make sure you give credit to Kitsunekko, the RAW as well as myself. See you on Saturday for Detective Conan 719.

Oh, and PokÃƒÂ©mon XY is on a break starting 23/12/13 and ending on 09/01/13. There is also a break on 23/01/13. I am not yet sure about Conan's breaks, but I'm assuming there'll be two weeks at the end of December with no episodes. 

Enjoy the episode, and depending on where you're from -- enjoy the holiday season!
